title: Alternating Curtsy Lunges
description: Standing with a braced core and flat back, bring your hands together at chest height. Position your feet to be at hip-width. Beginning with the right foot, step backwardÂ and across your left foot. Simultaneously, bend the left knee and drop it towards the ground. Stop when the front right knee is parallel with the ground. Push off the ground with your right foot and return to the starting position.
